ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Soulbinders
ygData.msgSnippet: Worked like a charm. Thanks, Matt and Gina. Chris ... From: Matthew Bond [mailto:mattgbond@ntlworld.com] Sent: Friday, July 18, 2003 4:17 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Worked like a charm. Thanks, Matt and Gina.

Chris

-----Original Message-----
From: Matthew Bond [mailto:mattgbond@...]
Sent: Friday, July 18, 2003 4:17 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Soulbinders


Chris Talbot wrote:
> Hi, everyone.
>
> I'm still fairly new to the group and to EverQuest. I've been lurking
> here for a short while. Many things in the game still confuse me. One
> is soulbinders. I want to get bound to the Plane of Knowledge. I've
> found the soulbinder there, but I can't figure out how to activate
> the binding.
>
> Can anyone help me out?

target the soulbinder, and /say bind my soul...

Matt
